name: Lovely Eyes
description:
Lovely eyes game is a free-to-play puzzle game with the physics touch to solve the puzzles.

Draw the line with your lovely finger to clear the challenging & interesting physics puzzle levels.

It is very easy game to play, you just need to swipe the moving object from one point to another logically, clearing the levels will depend on reaching the goal point static object.

Don't hit the black color objects!

Sound pretty easy right? Try it!

◆ 200 brain-teaser levels, with more being added all the time

◆ Multiple ways to solve each levels, try your best solution.

◆ You can also share the game with your friends

If you have enjoyed the game, please do share the game with your friends and family. We will bring more challenging levels soon!

Thank you very much for playing “Lovely Eyes”
